snippet: Christian youths killed at least 10 people in reprisal attacks after a church was bombed in Jos on Sunday, killing three people, authorities said.
abstract: Christian youths kill at least 10 people in reprisal attacks after three people were killed by suicide bomber at St Finbar's Catholic Church in Jos, Nigeria.
lead_paragraph: Christian youths killed at least 10 people in reprisal attacks after a church was bombed in Jos on Sunday, killing three people, authorities said.

headline.main: Nigeria: After Church Bombing, Deadly Attacks in Reprisal
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: After Church Bombing, Deadly Attacks in Reprisal
